entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 29 April 2023
